ComUser module¶

class ComUser.ComUser¶

Bases: object

The class communicate with the user and controls the whole work

get_db_lst()¶

Makes the list of available databases

get_db_number()¶

Asks user the number of database he/she wants to analyse at. Returns the given number. If that number is not valid, asks again.

get_db_str(number)¶

Returns the part of link to database.

get_gene_name()¶

Asks user the name of gene he/she wants to analyse. Returns the given name. Raises exception if that name is not valid.

static start()¶

Prints the starting text

geneanalysis_project
